mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: West Virginia History OnView and Storer College
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group Portrait of Storer College Faculty, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Faculty of Storer College, 1899-1901, sitting on the front steps of a building. First Row: Miss James, Mr. McDonald, Mrs. Lightner, Miss Johnson. Second Row: Mr. Hughey, Miss Sands. Third Row: Miss Baker, Miss Smith. Not Present: Mrs. Brackett
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: College teachers
Harpers Ferry
McDonald, Henry Temple, 1872 1951
Schools
Storer College
West Virginia
